segments.text: Mrs . Phoebe , here are your ordered goods . Please inspect the goods now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Let me have a check . Can you tell me how can you inspect your exported goods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our quality control department is in charge of the inspection , which is directly under general manager . It is essential to attach the importance to the quality of goods . It is the basement for the future cooperation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is good . And here I give you a piece of advice . You should have used stronger cardboard boxes for such a heavy item . Besides , it's better to secure the cartons with metal straps . What's more , the order number wasn't anywhere on some of the boxes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I realize that now . I will do that after a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Can I open the packages to check the color and style ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , let me help you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The color and style are consistent with the sample . Great !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , we are superior to other clothes companies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's for sure . There is nothing wrong with the quality . I think you'd better pack them first in plastic bags , than in cartons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . We will manage it later .
segments.speaker: S1
